org.jenkinsci.plugins.pipeline.modeldefi.value: "*${currentBuild.currentResult}: Great news! Artifact uploaded to nexus ${NEXUS_ARTIFACT_URL}. Job ${env.JOB_NAME} build ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}\n"
"*${currentBuild.currentResult}: Awesome! Docker image built. Job ${env.JOB_NAME} build ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}\n"

dockerfile = """ FROM openjdk:17-jdk-slim-bullseye RUN addgroup -system devopsc && useradd -G devopsc javams USER javams:devopsc ADD ${NEXUS_ARTIFACT_URL} /app.jar USER root RUN chmod 755 /app.jar USER javams:devopsc VOLUME /tmp EXPOSE 9090 ENTRYPOINT [ "sh", "-c", "java -Djava.security.egd=file:/dev/./urandom -jar /app.jar" ] """

"*${currentBuild.currentResult}: Success! Docker image available at https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/keberflores/${DOCKER_IMAGE_NAME}/general . Ready to go live? Job ${env.JOB_NAME} build ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}\n"
"*${currentBuild.currentResult}: Hello World! Docker image live online at https://app.devops-elgrupo.keberlabs.com . Job ${env.JOB_NAME} build ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}\n"
if docker ps -qa --filter 'name=app_proyectofinal' | grep -q . ; then docker stop app_proyectofinal && docker rm -fv app_proyectofinal;fi
